programs.name: Marriott Bonvoy
programs.summary: Global hotel ecosystem with 30 brands, elite choice benefits, and certificates that stretch further with 5th Night Free awards.
programs.seoDescription: Explore Marriott Bonvoy elite tiers, certificates, and redemption strategies to maximize the world’s largest hotel program.

overview.description: Global hotel loyalty program with elite status tiers, points on stays, and redemptions for nights, upgrades, and experiences.
overview.note: Marriott Bonvoy balances aspirational resorts with unmatched global coverage—ideal for frequent travelers who need both reach and rewards.

image.alt: Modern Marriott hotel lobby with warm lighting

items: Cost: Free to join for all travelers.
Elite Night Credits accrue through hotel stays, Homes & Villas reservations, meetings, and co-branded credit card bonuses.
Lifetime Silver, Gold, and Platinum status can be earned through long-term stay and elite year combinations.
enrollment.note: Ambassador Elite qualification adds a $23,000 USD annual spend requirement on top of 100 qualifying nights.

pointsEarn.title: Earning points
items: Earn 10 points per $1 on eligible room charges at most Marriott brands.
Element, Residence Inn, and TownePlace Suites earn 5 points per $1 while Homes & Villas by Marriott Bonvoy earns 2 points per $1.
Eligible incidentals—dining, spa treatments, and on-property services—also accrue points when charged to your room.
Elite bonuses start at 10% for Silver members and rise to 75% for Titanium and Ambassador elites.
Boost balances with co-branded Marriott credit cards and targeted promotions

pointsBurn.title: Redeeming points
items: Redeem for free nights, room upgrades, and Marriott Bonvoy Moments experiences worldwide.
Instantly apply points toward dining or spa charges during a stay, or choose Cash + Points to lower nightly costs.
Expect 0.4 - 0.5 INR per point in typical redemptions, with outsized value at aspirational resorts or peak cash rates.
HDFC Marriott Bonvoy – annual free night worth 15k points and 15 elite night credits.

image.alt: Stack of travel credit cards on a desk

items: 5th Night Free automatically applies on award stays of four nights or longer.
Suite Night Awards from Annual Choice Benefits request confirmed suite upgrades ahead of arrival.
Elite Night Credits from co-branded cards and milestone rewards accelerate qualification.
Lifetime Silver, Gold, and Platinum tiers lock in benefits after hitting long-term stay and elite year thresholds.
Lifetime status preserves core benefits even if annual stay activity dips.
Dynamic pricing means award costs vary by date and demand—plan around off-peak calendars when possible.
Status shortcuts exist via co-branded credit cards and targeted promotions.
Ambassador Elite adds personalized support plus the Your24 arrival and departure flexibility.

programs.name: Accor Live Limitless (ALL)
programs.summary: Earn Reward and Status Points across Accor’s luxury-to-economy brands with cash-like redemptions and lifestyle perks.
programs.seoDescription: Explore Accor Live Limitless elite tiers, earning rates, and fixed-value redemptions for hotel stays, dining, and experiences.

overview.description: Accor Live Limitless (ALL) is Accor’s global loyalty program rewarding hotel, dining, and lifestyle spend across brands like Raffles, Sofitel, Pullman, and ibis.
items: Earn both Reward Points and Status Points on stays, dining, and events.
Redeem with a fixed cash value: 2,000 Reward Points reduce eligible bills by €40.
Lifestyle partnerships unlock VIP access to concerts, sports, and cultural events.
Accor Plus provides accelerated earn and dining benefits.
overview.note: The program’s cash-equivalent redemption structure keeps point values predictable with no blackout dates.

image.alt: Guest enjoying a chic hotel lobby within the Accor portfolio

rows.label: Reward Point bonus
rows.description: Earn rates vary by brand category with incremental elite bonuses on top of base earn.

statusLevels.note: Diamond status unlocks a complimentary weekend night, dining credits, and a dedicated support line.

image.alt: Accor guest suite with city skyline views

items: Regional Accor credit cards in select markets
coBrandedCards.note: No co-branded card in India yet, but local issuers offer ALL earning cards in Europe, Asia, and Australia.

items: Earn Reward & Status Points on room rate, taxes, dining, spa, and event spend.
Luxury brands earn 25 Reward Points per €10; midscale 12.5; economy 10.
Earn points via Accor Plus dining and partner airlines
Redeem at a fixed rate: 2,000 Reward Points = €40 toward eligible charges.
Use points to pay for stays, dining, spa services, and room upgrades with no blackout dates.
Access experiences, concerts, sports events, and partner redemptions including airlines and car rentals.
Combine cash + points at checkout to stretch balances for longer stays.
Program is free to join; elite status is earned via stays and Status Points.
Accor Plus membership (paid) boosts dining discounts and points earning in Asia Pacific.
Accor Plus membership (paid) also give 2 Buy One Get One Nights.

programs.name: IHG One Rewards
programs.summary: Milestone Rewards, dynamic award pricing, and suite upgrades keep IHG One Rewards competitive for frequent guests.
programs.seoDescription: Learn how IHG One Rewards members earn and redeem points for free nights, suite upgrades, Milestone Rewards, and flexible Point & Cash bookings.

items: Earn points on stays across brands like InterContinental, Kimpton, Six Senses, and Holiday Inn.
Dynamic pricing and Point & Cash awards offer flexibility when redeeming for free nights.
Milestone Rewards every 10 nights from 20 to 100 nights unlock suite upgrades and food & beverage credits.
Diamond elites can choose free breakfast while suite upgrades extend to select luxury stays.
overview.note: IHG’s overhaul introduced meaningful elite benefits, especially when you plan stays around Milestone Rewards thresholds.

rows.label: Welcome amenity
values: Points or drink/snack at select brands
Points or drink/snack at select brands

rows.label: Room upgrades
values: Best available rooms including suites (where offered)

rows.label: Lounge access
values: Available via Milestone Rewards or participating luxury brands

rows.label: Milestone choice awards
rows.description: Pick from suite upgrades, annual lounge membership, or food & beverage credits starting at 20 nights.

statusLevels.note: Milestone Rewards are the secret sauce—plan your stays every 10 nights to pick bonuses like suite upgrades or lounge membership.

items: IHG One Rewards Premier Credit Card
IHG One Rewards Premier Business Credit Card
IHG One Rewards Traveler Credit Card
coBrandedCards.note: Premier cards deliver a 40K free night certificate each cardmember year plus a 4th Night Free award perk.

items: Earn 10 base points per $1 at most brands and 5 points per $1 at Staybridge Suites and Candlewood Suites.
Silver, Gold, Platinum, and Diamond elites receive 20%, 40%, 60%, and 100% point bonuses respectively.
Eligible charges include room rates, on-property dining, and other hotel incidentals.
Boost earnings with IHG co-branded credit cards, airline and car rental partners, or dining partners.
Redeem for free nights, room upgrades, or experiences through the IHG marketplace.
Point & Cash bookings provide flexibility when you are short on points.
Transfer to airline partners or redeem for digital rewards and merchandise.
IHG One Rewards is complimentary; elite tiers are achieved through stays, qualifying points, or co-branded credit cards.
InterContinental Ambassador membership adds guaranteed upgrades, a free weekend night, and other InterContinental perks.
Milestone Rewards every 10 nights from 20 to 100 nights let you pick bonus points, credits, or suite upgrades.
Diamond elites can select free breakfast as part of their welcome amenity.
Elite rollover nights help maintain status into the next year.
Premier cardholders receive a Fourth Night Free award when redeeming points.

programs.name: Club ITC Culinaire
programs.footprint: 350+ ITC Hotels, Welcomhotels, Mementos, Storii, Fortune, and select Sheraton properties across India
programs.summary: Paid dining and hospitality membership layering 20% savings with Green Points, milestone vouchers, and complimentary nights across the ITC portfolio.
programs.seoDescription: Review Club ITC Culinaire pricing, elite alignment, milestone rewards, and voucher perks for maximizing ITC Hotels dining and stay value.

overview.description: Culinaire links directly with Club ITC to deliver immediate savings, Green Points, and curated dining and stay experiences.
items: Enjoy 20% savings on dining, spa, and laundry at participating ITC-managed hotels.
Earn Green Points on food & beverage and accommodation spending to accelerate Club ITC status.
Unlock milestone vouchers for upgrades, buffet meals, and suite credits as annual spend grows.
Complimentary nights, celebratory cakes, and buffet experiences anchor the yearly voucher pack.
Add a spouse for ₹1,000 per year to share on-property discounts (voucher entitlements excluded).
overview.note: The 20% savings apply for up to 15 diners per bill, ideal for family celebrations and corporate dining.

quickFacts.label: Green Points earning
quickFacts.value: Up to 6% on F&B with elite alignment

items: Memberships are sold in one to five year bundles with tiered pricing for Select and Elite variants.
Renew before expiry to receive a 1,500 Green Points bonus on any Culinaire plan.
Existing Club ITC members retain their membership number when upgrading into Culinaire.
enrollment.note: Prices listed are pre-tax; GST applies to both enrollment and select voucher redemptions from January 1, 2025.

eliteBenefitDetails.title: Club ITC elite alignment
items: Silver + Culinaire earns 6% Green Points on dining and 4% on stays.
Gold + Culinaire boosts earning to 9% on dining and 6% on stays.
Platinum and Platinum Select + Culinaire members receive 12% on dining and 8% on stays.
eliteBenefitDetails.note: Culinaire stacking accelerates Club ITC tier progression via enhanced Green Point accrual.

paidMemberships.title: Culinaire plan variants
items: Culinaire Select: ₹19,000 for 1 year (₹34,200 for 2 years; ₹48,450 for 3; ₹60,800 for 4; ₹71,250 for 5) with one complimentary night, two meals for two, a cake, and two 50% dining vouchers.

Culinaire Elite: ₹29,500 for 1 year (₹53,100 for 2 years; ₹75,250 for 3; ₹94,400 for 4; ₹110,650 for 5) with two complimentary nights, four meals for two, enhanced Green Point earning, and premium rate vouchers.
Optional spouse add-on: ₹1,000 per year plus taxes granting shared savings but no duplicate vouchers.

specialPerks.title: Milestone rewards
specialPerks.description: Track eligible food and beverage spend each calendar year to unlock layered vouchers.
items: ₹30,000 spend: complimentary room upgrade voucher.
₹90,000 spend: complimentary buffet meal for two.
₹1,20,000 spend: ₹5,000 hotel credit redeemable during a suite night stay.
₹2,00,000 spend: additional complimentary buffet meal for two.
specialPerks.note: Milestone spending must be achieved within a single calendar year; unused balances do not roll over.

items: Voucher mix includes complimentary suite experiences and 15%–20% Best Available Rate certificates depending on tier.
Green Points and active vouchers migrate automatically when transitioning from legacy Club ITC or Culinaire memberships.
Guest care is available at participating ITC Hotels and Welcomhotels, with email support via clubitc@itchotels.in.
Spouse plans are valid only alongside an active primary Culinaire membership.
Vouchers can be redeemed at participating ITC-managed hotels; WelcomHeritage Hotels offer only the 20% dining discount with no Green Points accrual.
Effective January 1, 2025, GST applies when redeeming luxury stay vouchers.
Member migration retains existing membership numbers with tier mapping based on prior-year activity.
notesSection.note: For more details visit https://www.itchotels.com/clubitc/culinaire or email clubitc@itchotels.in.

programs.name: Taj Epicure
programs.footprint: Taj, SeleQtions, Vivanta, and Taj Safaris hotels across India
programs.summary: Paid membership by IHCL bundling 25% dining savings, spa discounts, Qmin delivery perks, and a deep roster of stay vouchers at Taj brands.
programs.seoDescription: Explore Taj Epicure Preferred and Privileged benefits, pricing, and voucher inclusions for maximizing dining and stay value at Taj Hotels.

overview.description: Epicure delivers Taj guests a blend of dining value, wellness perks, and stay experiences across IHCL’s luxury and lifestyle portfolio.
items: Save 25% on dining in-residence and Qmin delivery orders alongside 20% spa savings.
Receive complimentary night certificates, room upgrades, and set meals for two.
Benefit from Taj Club lounge access vouchers, curated pool lunch with wine experiences, and celebratory cake inclusions.
Membership aligns with NeuPass, providing Silver or Gold tiers depending on plan selection.
Phone and email concierge support assist with voucher usage and escalations.
overview.note: Present a valid Epicure membership card to access dining discounts at participating restaurants.

quickFacts.label: NeuPass tier
quickFacts.value: Silver or Gold depending on membership

items: Epicure Preferred membership is priced at ₹25,000 plus taxes; Epicure Privileged is ₹50,000 plus taxes.
Add-on cards are available so family members can redeem on-property discounts and vouchers.
Reach support at 1800-111-825 or epicure.escalations@ihcltata.com for onboarding or assistance.

paidMemberships.title: Epicure plan benefits
items: Epicure Preferred: 25% dining and Qmin savings, one complimentary night stay, two set meals for two, two one-level upgrades, one 60-minute spa treatment, rate vouchers across Taj Palaces, City Resorts, and Taj Safaris, plus a pool lunch with wine experience.

Epicure Privileged: Mirrors Preferred discounts with two complimentary nights, four set meals for two, four room upgrades, three 60-minute spa sessions, expanded rate vouchers, Taj Club lounge access, and a pool lunch with wine experience.
Both tiers include a celebratory birthday cake and eligibility for add-on member cards.
Complimentary room upgrades are subject to availability at check-in.
Select benefits, including experiences and spa sessions, are limited to once per membership year.
Escalation support is available via praloy.saha@ihcltata.com for unresolved service issues.
Vouchers are redeemable only at participating Taj, SeleQtions, Vivanta, and Taj Safaris hotels.
Club lounge access vouchers are exclusive to Epicure Privileged memberships.
Room upgrades require eligible rate bookings and remain subject to inventory at time of arrival.
